title: Young Chinese Women Hire Female Cosplayers To Play Dream Men
content: During her final years of high school, Chinese teenager Xu Yunting found an unusual way to make some pocket money -- transforming herself into male video game characters and taking their female devotees on dates.
summary: During her final years of high school, Chinese teenager Xu Yunting found an unusual way to make some pocket money -- transforming herself into male video game characters and taking their female devotees on dates.

title: Pak Woman Killed In Front Of Father For Refusing Marriage Proposal: Report
content: A 40-year-old female school teacher was allegedly shot and killed in front of her father after she refused a marriage proposal, ARY News reported.
summary: A 40-year-old female school teacher was allegedly shot and killed in front of her father after she refused a marriage proposal, ARY News reported.

title: Brazilian Bodybuilder With "Brilliant Future Ahead" Dies Aged 19
content: A 19-year-old bodybuilder from Brazil was found dead at his home on Sunday afternoon, allegedly due to a heart attack, according to various reports.
summary: A 19-year-old bodybuilder from Brazil was found dead at his home on Sunday afternoon, allegedly due to a heart attack, according to various reports.

title: Pak Restricts Public Servants From Using Social Media Without Permission
content: The Pakistan government has issued an order barring all government employees from using social media without permission to stop disclosure of official information and documents, The News International reported.
summary: The Pakistan government has issued an order barring all government employees from using social media without permission to stop disclosure of official information and documents, The News International reported.

title: "Surgery Addict" Brazil Influencer Says Butt Lift Filler Left Her Infertile
content: Jennifer Pamplona, a self-proclaimed ''surgery addict'', revealed that polymethyl methacrylate (PMMA), a common cosmetic material used in butt lift fillers left her infertile.
summary: Jennifer Pamplona, a self-proclaimed ''surgery addict'', revealed that polymethyl methacrylate (PMMA), a common cosmetic material used in butt lift fillers left her infertile.

title: 4 Indians Charred In Multi-Car Crash In US, They Were Carpooling
content: Four Indians, including a woman, have died in a massive crash involving five vehicles in US' Texas. The victims had connected through a carpooling app and were on their way to Bentonville in Arkansas on Friday when the tragedy struck.
summary: Four Indians, including a woman, have died in a massive crash involving five vehicles in US' Texas. The victims had connected through a carpooling app and were on their way to Bentonville in Arkansas on Friday when the tragedy struck.

title: Angry Bear Attacks Circus Trainer In Front Of Horrified Audience In Russia
content: The horrified audience watched in terror as the bear viciously attacked Mr Prichinich, pinning him to the ground for approximately half a minute.
summary: The horrified audience watched in terror as the bear viciously attacked Mr Prichinich, pinning him to the ground for approximately half a minute.

title: Australian Air Traffic Controller Found Asleep Under A Blanket Mid-Shift
content: Australia's air safety investigators have recommended reforms after a Brisbane air traffic controller was found asleep at his desk while covering an early-morning shift.
summary: Australia's air safety investigators have recommended reforms after a Brisbane air traffic controller was found asleep at his desk while covering an early-morning shift.

title: Fugitive Ex-Mayor From Philippines Arrested In Indonesia: Manila
content: A fugitive former mayor in the Philippines accused of links to Chinese criminal syndicates has been arrested in Indonesia, Manila's justice ministry said in a statement on Wednesday.
summary: A fugitive former mayor in the Philippines accused of links to Chinese criminal syndicates has been arrested in Indonesia, Manila's justice ministry said in a statement on Wednesday.

title: US To Award HP $50 Million For Semiconductor Technologies Project
content: The US Commerce Department said Tuesday it plans to award $50 million to HP to support the expansion and modernization of an existing company facility in Oregon that will boost key semiconductor technologies.
summary: The US Commerce Department said Tuesday it plans to award $50 million to HP to support the expansion and modernization of an existing company facility in Oregon that will boost key semiconductor technologies.

title: Meet World's Oldest Crocodile Henry Who Has 6 Wives And 10,000 Babies
content: Henry, the crocodile, got his name from the famous hunter, Sir Henry Neumann, who was once appointed to kill him.Â
summary: Henry, the crocodile, got his name from the famous hunter, Sir Henry Neumann, who was once appointed to kill him.

title: "Day Of Dismissals": Several Ukrainian Ministers Resign Ahead Of Reshuffle
content: At least six Ukrainian officials including cabinet ministers submitted their resignation on Tuesday and a presidential aide was dismissed, as the ruling party signalled a major government reshuffle was underway.
summary: At least six Ukrainian officials including cabinet ministers submitted their resignation on Tuesday and a presidential aide was dismissed, as the ruling party signalled a major government reshuffle was underway.

title: "Ketamine Queen", Doctor To Be Tried In March Over Matthew Perry's Death
content: A California doctor and a woman charged with illegally supplying the drug ketamine to "Friends" star Matthew Perry before his overdose death will face trial in March, according to court documents released on Tuesday.
summary: A California doctor and a woman charged with illegally supplying the drug ketamine to "Friends" star Matthew Perry before his overdose death will face trial in March, according to court documents released on Tuesday.

title: US Charges Hamas Leaders With "Terrorism" Over October 7 Attack On Israel
content: The United States has charged leaders of the armed Palestinian group Hamas with a raft of "terrorism" offenses, federal court documents unsealed on Tuesday revealed.
summary: The United States has charged leaders of the armed Palestinian group Hamas with a raft of "terrorism" offenses, federal court documents unsealed on Tuesday revealed.

title: Airbnb Asks New York To Reconsider Regulations On Short-Term Rentals
content: Airbnb on Tuesday asked New York City to reconsider regulations on short-term rentals that went into effect in September 2023, citing higher prices for travelers and zero impact on the housing market.
summary: Airbnb on Tuesday asked New York City to reconsider regulations on short-term rentals that went into effect in September 2023, citing higher prices for travelers and zero impact on the housing market.

title: Trump Pleading Not Guilty To Revised 2020 Election Charges
content: Donald Trump is to plead not guilty to the charges in a revised indictment accusing him of seeking to overturn the results of the 2020 US presidential election, according to a court filing on Tuesday.
summary: Donald Trump is to plead not guilty to the charges in a revised indictment accusing him of seeking to overturn the results of the 2020 US presidential election, according to a court filing on Tuesday.

title: New York Governor's Former Aide Charged With Acting As Chinese Agent
content: A former aide to New York Governor Kathy Hochul has been arrested today and charged with acting as an undisclosed agent of China, federal prosecutors in Brooklyn said.
summary: A former aide to New York Governor Kathy Hochul has been arrested today and charged with acting as an undisclosed agent of China, federal prosecutors in Brooklyn said.

title: Israeli Minister Plans Spending Cuts In 2025 Budget To Fund Gaza War
content: Israeli Finance Minister Bezalel Smotrich said on Tuesday the 2025 state budget will feature steep spending cuts as the government tries to balance fiscal responsibility with a need to finance Israel's ongoing war with Hamas in Gaza.
summary: Israeli Finance Minister Bezalel Smotrich said on Tuesday the 2025 state budget will feature steep spending cuts as the government tries to balance fiscal responsibility with a need to finance Israel's ongoing war with Hamas in Gaza.

title: Chinese Man Seeks To Revoke Home Gift To Colleague After Remarrying at 93
content: Despite Tan's dissatisfaction with his children and his belief that Gu and his family provided better support, his request to reclaim the property was denied by the court.
summary: Despite Tan's dissatisfaction with his children and his belief that Gu and his family provided better support, his request to reclaim the property was denied by the court.

title: Islamic State Group Claims Afghanistan Suicide Attack In Which 6 Died
content: The Islamic State group claimed on Tuesday a suicide attack in the Afghan capital that killed six people a day earlier, saying it had targeted the Taliban government's prosecution service.
summary: The Islamic State group claimed on Tuesday a suicide attack in the Afghan capital that killed six people a day earlier, saying it had targeted the Taliban government's prosecution service.
